Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is partially covered with a grey-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393785) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393785)
